description: Categorize sources by their original media forms.

tags.description: This source is primarily a broadcast radio station or podcast (ie. audio transcriptions). Examples: NPR.
tags.label: Audio Broadcast
tags.tag_set_description: Categorize sources by their original media forms.

tags.description: This source is internet based. Use this for news sources that began on the internet first, organizational websites, and blogs. Examples: CDC, Vox, Scroll.in.
tags.label: Digital Native
tags.tag_set_description: Categorize sources by their original media forms.

tags.description: This source doesn't fit in any of the other categories. Examples: AP, Reuters.
tags.label: Other
tags.tag_set_description: Categorize sources by their original media forms.

tags.description: This source is primarly a print publication. Use this for newspapers and magazines. Examples: New York Times, The Economist.
tags.label: Print Native
tags.tag_set_description: Categorize sources by their original media forms.

tags.description: This source is primarily a broadcast TV station (ie. video transcriptions or closed captions). Examples: CNN, FoxNews.
tags.label: Video Broadcast
tags.tag_set_description: Categorize sources by their original media forms.

label: Media Type
name: Media Type
